robot_capabilities.TrayBot: Mobile indoor robot with multi-bin sorting tray. Can detect, pick, carry, and deliver small household items. Equipped with vision and object recognition. Capable of quantity tracking and organizing items in separate compartments.

robot_morphology.TrayBot: Payload: ~5 kg, Speed: 0–1.5 m/s, Weight: 12 kg, Size: 400 × 300 × 350 mm, Tray: 4-bin sorting, Arm Reach: 250 mm, Sensors: RGB camera, Depth, Weight sensor
